creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: view of orange, green and grey rooftops of a crowded city; thin tree in foreground; foliage with pink and orange blooms at bottom; grey sky; shin hanga (fūkei-ga)
marks: Left: [一九八五年　サンフランシスコ] {1985nen saku, ?????}; bott
title: San Francisco
